name: Deadhang
how_to_perform:
# 1. Start by hanging vertically from a pull-up bar with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body fully extended.

# 2. Engage your core muscles by drawing your belly button towards your spine, ensuring that your pelvis remains neutral throughout the exercise.

# 3. Focus on squeezing your glutes and quadriceps to control the movement and prevent unwanted swinging or momentum from building up.

# 4. Hold the hang for the desired time duration, aiming for a steady state where you feel no fatigue in your shoulders, arms, or legs.
short_summary: Deadhang is an isometric stretching exercise that targets the muscles of the lower body, used to gain flexiblity and reduce soreness.
